name: Antonio SIERRA, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Sierra v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Antonio SIERRA, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 13th day of September, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Pro se Notice to be Heard Before a Judge are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
157 A.3d 484
Antonio SIERRA, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent
